metadata.title: Hearty - Cross-Generational Voice Communication Platform
metadata.description: A warm communication platform where all generations from teens to 80s+ can anonymously share voice messages as mentors, peers, and friends. Features senior-friendly design for everyone.
metadata.keywords: intergenerational communication, voice messages, mentor, peer, friend, anonymous chat, senior-friendly, warm conversation, generational empathy

howItWorks.title: Start Warm Communication in 3 Simple Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Intuitive usage that anyone can easily participate in

steps.title: Set Up Profile
steps.description: Create your unique profile by selecting age group, interests, and communication style

steps.title: Create Voice Message
steps.description: Leave a warm voice message under 1 minute on topics that interest you

steps.title: Cross-Generational Communication
steps.description: Listen to messages from other generations and start meaningful exchanges by responding

items.message: Talking with young people makes me feel young again. It's rewarding that my experiences can help.
When struggling with parenting and work, talking with people who have similar concerns brings comfort.
Listening to life advice from elders makes me reflect on my own life. It's truly precious time.

cta.title: Start Warm Communication Right Now
cta.subtitle: There are people waiting for your voice

meta.title: Account Deletion Guide - Hearty
meta.description: Learn how to delete your Hearty account and important considerations

deleteAccount.title: Account Deletion Guide
deleteAccount.subtitle: If you wish to delete your account, please carefully review the information below. Deleted accounts and data cannot be recovered.

warning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notice
warning.content: Account deletion is an irreversible action. Please make sure to review the information below before proceeding with deletion.

steps.0: Open the Hearty app and log in

contact.title: Request Deletion via Support
contact.description: If you have difficulty deleting through the app, please contact our customer support directly.

timeline.title: Deletion Timeline
timeline.description: Service access will be immediately suspended after requesting account deletion, and all personal data will be completely deleted within 7 days. Backup system data will be deleted within 30 days.

legalRetention.title: Legally Required Data Retention
legalRetention.description: In accordance with applicable laws, some data must be retained for the legal retention period:

0.title: Service abuse records (1 year)
0.description: Records for preventing fraudulent registration and usage

1.title: Consumer complaint handling records (3 years)
1.description: Dispute resolution records under E-commerce Act

2.title: Website log records (3 months)
2.description: Access records under Communications Secrets Protection Act

irreversible.title: Irreversible Consequences
irreversible.description: Once your account is deleted, the following consequences will occur and cannot be undone:

consequences.0: All personal data and content will be permanently deleted
consequences.1: Previous data cannot be recovered even if you re-register with the same information
consequences.2: No data can be restored through any means after deletion

footer.help: If you have any questions about account deletion, please feel free to contact us.
